title: Sugar Bowl And Cover, ca. 1770
medium: Soft-paste porcelain, polychrome overglaze decoration, gilding
description: Tray attached to bowl, oval with shaped edges; bowl rounded, with shaped edges which are repeated in contour of domed cover. Cover has handle in form of an olive branch with leaves and olives, and notch for ladle. Decorated with sprays of flowers.

tombstone.epitaph: Sugar Bowl And Cover, ca. 1770. Soft-paste porcelain, polychrome overglaze decoration, gilding. 1906-23-5-a,b.
